name: Bob Marley Game: World Tour
description:
Free up yourself and become a music legend in the first official Bob Marley game!

Tap to the beat during concerts and achieve some crazy combos!

Unlock Bob Marley as a playable character!

Collect rare, epic and legendary musicians with various music styles!

Play original tunes from Bob Marley and Ziggy Marley!

Includes brand new covers and remixes of Bob Marley songs!

Manage and upgrade your singers, guitarists, bassists and drummers to play lively concerts and appeal to the audience!

Spread peace and love through your songs, and travel around the globe!

Follow Bob’s legendary footsteps and build a global music empire!

Perform in 8 different genres:
• Alternative Rock
• Blues
• House
• Latin Modern
• Old School Hip Hop
• Classic Pop
• Roots Reggae
• Soul

Tour the globe and unite the world through music!*
• Berlin
• New York
• London
• Los Angeles
• Kingston
• Paris
• Milan
• Sydney
• Tokyo

Bob Marley: World Tour is free to play, but you can choose to pay real money for some extra items (*and unlocking certain cities), which will charge your App Store account. In-app purchasing can be disabled by adjusting your device settings. An internet connection is required to play.

Help make the world a greener place!
In-app purchases made in the game will also help support global reforestation through donations to One Tree Planted to plant trees around the world. Learn more at OneTreePlanted.org.
